newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: ABN AMRO no comment on Horlick "talks".
newsitem.headline: ABN AMRO no comment on Horlick "talks".

text.p: Dutch bank ABN AMRO NV said on Wednesday it still had no comment on reports it had tried to hire Nicola Horlick, the controversial former Morgan Grenfell Asset Management (MGAM) fund manager.
"We have said all we want to say on this matter (despite) the fact that other people add new information," spokesman Tanno Massar told Reuters.

Horlick, who resigned from MGAM last week, earlier said she had held informal and preliminary talks with ABN AMRO until she was suspended by MGAM last week amid claims she planned to leave and possibly take staff with her.
